fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds__ - Best option when buffed by Bennett and playing on field even with 1 stack

__Skyward Atlas__ - Great general option, can be best for quickswap

__Memory of Dust__ - Best option when shielded without buffs, falls off with ATK buffs
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Kagura's Verity, Solar Pearl, Widsith__ - Generally strong catalysts; holds true for Ningguang

__Oathsworn Eye, Dodoco Tales__ - good F2P options
** **

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge(till ER requirement)|CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Starshatter
**2)** Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
**3)** Elemental Skill: Jade Screen

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
ER Requirement:
<15s rotations: 120-130%
20+s rotations : 100-110%

__Furina__
If played with Furina and a suitable healer, consider Marechaussee Hunter. If not, it is not recommended as it does not buff Elemental Burst DMG.
